title: New: Mental Bend – Take My Hand
content:
German duo Mental Bend blends a disarming dream pop sensitivity inside its fragile electronic world. Sissip‘s stunningly velvet vocals co-exist in perfect harmony with Hendrik‘s digital orchestration, managing to sound somewhere between a luminous XX and a Dionysian Jessie Ware. Take My Hand is here to enslave your senses with its soulful, late night groove and minimal simplicity that proves to be so rich and colourful like fireworks in the sky. 2014 looks great so far….

Download Mental Bend‘s debut EP over here
